attributes.action: Save Channel 7 CIC, the last nonprofit community TV channel in England from being axed by Virgin Media
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Channel 7 CIC is the longest running community tv station in England. It is now facing being removed from the Virgin Media cable network in Northern Lincolnshire. Virgin Media have said they wish to extend bandwidth in the larger cities. We must keep this local voice in one of the most deprived areas of the UK. The channel also provides valuable work experience for students, volunteers and members of the community to develop communications skills and enter the creative and digital sector.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
